core.description: Describe sexual reproduction as a process involving the fusion of the nuclei of two gametes to form a zygote and the production of offspring that are genetically different from each other
Describe fertilisation as the fusion of the nuclei of gametes

supplement.description: State that nuclei of gametes are haploid and that the nucleus of a zygote is diploid
Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of sexual reproduction: (a) to a population of a species in the wild (b) to crop production
